Amazing poem with good rhymes, the poem has a silky smooth read to it. 

But I also think itâ€™d be more effective without the last line. 

The 2nd last line is punchy and hitting where as the last line stops the hard hitting ending and makes it smooth again which almost makes it seem as if it fizzles out at the end.

This poem is amazing, I found my myself lost in the words and physically taking in a deep breath each time it said â€œI breatheâ€. 

The structure is simple but very effective and empathises the almost morbid or heady feel to the poem.  

Not only does your poem spark emotions, itâ€™s really powerful in the sense that at the start you think that itâ€™s going to be reasons not to live but theyâ€™re actually reasons too live.
